PageTitle: mpls pw static source-tunnel check disable
FuncDef:
The mpls pw static source-tunnel check disable command disables the PW source interface check function.
The undo mpls pw static source-tunnel check disable command restores the default configuration.
By default, the PW source interface check function is enabled.
CLIs: mpls pw static source-tunnel check disable
undo mpls pw static source-tunnel check disable
Examples: [~HUAWEI] mpls pw static source-tunnel check disable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To disable the PW source interface check function, run the mpls pw static source-tunnel check disable command. Leaving the PW source interface check function enabled will affect system performance.
